name: music-ui
description: Look at the [Nuxt documentation](https://nuxt.com/docs/getting-started/introduction) to learn more.

scripts.download-repositories: cd packages && git clone https://github.com/cassitly/music-cover-renderer.git && git clone https://github.com/cassitly/music-code.git
scripts.install-repositories: cd music-cover-renderer/server && git clone https://github.com/cassitly/music-server.git && git clone https://github.com/cassitly/api-plugin.git && cd ../../music-code/packages && git clone https://github.com/cassitly/api-plugin.git && cd ../../../
scripts.download-dependencies: cd packages/music-cover-renderer/ && npm install && cd ../music-code/ && npm install
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && cd ../../music-cover-renderer/server/api-plugin/ && npm install && cd ../music-server/ && npm install
scripts.build: npm run create-repository && npm run download-repositories && npm run install-repositories && npm run download-dependencies && npm run install-dependencies
